CustomField.description: A user-friendly, transient message describing the current step of the agent's background processing. This is polled by the UI to provide real-time feedback and is cleared when the turn is complete.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Internal Framework Use: This field is updated by the TurnLifecycleService to show status like 'Executing tool: Find Records...' and is cleared upon turn completion or failure.
CustomField.label: Current Step Description
